title: BRIEF-Jasco Electronics Says Advanced Negotiations Regarding Disposal Of Unit Still Ongoing
text:
BRIEF-Jasco Electronics Says Advanced Negotiations Regarding Disposal Of Unit Still Ongoing

Stock Markets 55 minutes ago (Sep 18, 2019 14:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Jasco Electronics Says Advanced Negotiations Regarding Disposal Of Unit Still Ongoing Sept 18 (Reuters) - Jasco Electronics Holdings Ltd : * JSE: JSC - RENEWAL OF CAUTIONARY ANNOUNCMENT * JASCO ELECTRONICS HOLDINGS LTD - ADVANCED NEGOTIATIONS ARE STILL ONGOING, REGARDING DISPOSAL OF A BUSINESS UNIT * JASCO ELECTRONICS - SHAREHOLDERS ARE ADVISED TO CONTINUE TO EXERCISE CAUTION WHEN DEALING IN COMPANY'S SECURITIES

BRIEF-Jasco Electronics Says Advanced Negotiations Regarding Disposal Of Unit Still Ongoing
description: BRIEF-Jasco Electronics Says Advanced Negotiations Regarding Disposal Of Unit Still Ongoing
